rqdatatable 1.1.6

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

rqdatatable 1.1.6 2019/05/13 Unreleased

  • Fix some global env references.

rqdatatable 1.1.5 2019/04/24 2019-04-25

  • Re-export basic pivot capability.

rqdatatable 1.1.4 2019/02/24 2019-02-25

  • extra copy in ex_data_table.relop_list() (just in case).

rqdatatable 1.1.3 2019/02/17 2019-02-17

  • Move to RUnit.
  • More tests.
  • Add ex_data_table.relop_list().

rqdatatable 1.1.2 2018/12/17 2018-12-17

  • Allow more control of ordering in extend.
  • Relax column production check.
  • Add rq_ufn().
  • More of force parent.frame forcing.
  • Add row limit to order.
  • Add order_expr.
  • Add power test.

rqdatatable 1.1.1 2018/09/20 2018-09-20

  • alternate data.table implementation path.
  • force parent.frame.

rqdatatable 1.0.0 2018/09/10 2018-09-10

  • allow no group columns project.
  • work on ordering in extend.

rqdatatable 0.1.4 2018/08/18 2018-08-18

  • More tests.
  • Work on result print-visibility.

rqdatatable 0.1.3 2018/07/28 2018-07-29

  • Fix full join print glitch.
  • data.table implementation of theta-join.
  • Documentation fixes.

rqdatatable 0.1.2 2018/07/08 2018-07-09

  • Adapt to instant execution path.
  • Don’t expect %>>%.
  • Documentation improvements.

rqdatatable 0.1.1 2018/06/26 2018-06-27

  • Don’t use isFALSE() (new to R 3.5.0).
  • Update install instructions.
  • Improve regexps.

rqdatatable 0.1.0 2018/06/18 2018-06-19

  • First CRAN release.
